Question: Default
Answer: I'm sorry, but I don't understand you. Try to say otherwise. I know everything about Tap Tap Builder, but no more. You'd better ask developers, they will definitely help you! Please email to support@herocraft.com

Question: Hello!
Answer: Hello, mayor! What can I help you with?

Question: How can I get free Ruby Keys?
Answer:
Well, you can get Ruby Keys for free in the following ways:
- subscribe us on Facebook to get free daily coupons
- watch ads in Cinema and select random reward
- build and upgrade Game Store
- build Crystal Bank
- collect 10 invite coupons using Pub
- invite your friends on Facebook
- find Promo Codes in social networks using #TapTapBuilder
- make donations to Church, Cathedral or Mosque
- catch rare red airplanes

Question: How to get Golden Keys? And how can I use them?
Answer:
- you are receiving Golden Keys when your city reaches a new level
- Golden Keys are required for building and upgrading Special buildings
- you can also use it in Pawnshop to get extra incomes
- you can buy some Golden Keys in a Game Store

Question: My game lags and crashes sometimes =(
Answer: Probably, the performance of your device is not enough. We know about this issue and working on fixing it, sorry.

Question: Where can I enter coupons (code) and what are they?
Answer: You can send and receive credits and resources using Post Office. The coupons are 5-digit codes, and you can send them to other players. Note, that all coupons are valid for only 2 days!

Question: What are the invite coupons?
Answer: You can send invite code to another player using Pub. Invite code has 6 digits. You can send only 5 invite codes and receive up to 10 invite codes. You will receive credits, resources and keys for receiving invite codes from other players.

Question: I can't decode a coupon =(
Answer: First, check if your coupons was entered with no mistakes. Then make sure your Postal Code was used when generating coupon. Note, that all coupons are valid for only 2 days!

Question: What are the Promo Codes?
Answer:
- Promo Codes are not the same as coupons
- Promo Codes are 6-digit codes
- you can collect Promo Codes in Main Server
- you will get a reward for collecting Promo Codes
- you can find Promo Codes in social networks using #TapTapBuidler hashtag
- you can share your Promo Code with other player from settings window

Question: How do I demolish buildings?
Answer:
- select the building you want to demolish
- open it by double clicking
- press the yellow wrench button
- select demolish option

Question: How do I move buildings?
Answer:
- select the building you want to move
- open it by double clicking
- press the yellow wrench button
- select move option
- you need an Architectural Administration for moving buildings
- moving building also costs credits

Question: How do I extend my island?
Answer: Build Landscape Institute and use it to dry sea!

Question: How do I save my game?
Answer:
- the game saves your progress automatically on the device
- you can also save your game to cloud services from settings menu (iCloud, Play Games, Facebook)
- make sure you have a valid account and network connection available

Question: How do I load my game?
Answer:
- Can I play on other devices?
- yes, you can!
- on the iOS, your progress will be automatically synced by iCloud
- on other platforms, use cloud save / load feature to transfer your progress

Question: I'm stuck, I have no credits or resources. What I supposed to do?
Answer:
- work in Office, Metallurgical Plant or Concrete Plant to get credits, metal and concrete
- ask other players to help you, they can send you resources using Post Office
- just relax for a few hours and then return to the game =)

Question: How to increase credits limit?
Answer: Build a Bank or Central Bank to increase maximum credits you can own. Moreover, you will receive % from all deposits when offline!

Question: I've got lack of employees, how to fix it?
Answer:
- you can work in Apartment Buildings to increase your population
- wait a few hours and population will increase
- build a Hospital and City Administration to increase population growth
- demolish any building with employees to get free employees

Question: I'm stuck, I have no power and employees, and I can't build or upgrade a Power Plant
Answer: Demolish any building with employees to get free employees and reduce power consumption. And don't forget to follow ingame tips!

Question: Why my power level is not increasing? How to increase it?
Answer:
- power is a level value, and it doesn't increase with time
- you must build or upgrade a Power Plant to increase your power level
- all new buildings and their upgrades will reduce your power level

Question: How to restore my energy?
Answer:
- build a Fitness Club
- work in Fitness Club to restore energy
- wait a little and your energy will be restored to the maximum level automatically
- Prime SPA Center will double energy restoring speed after its construction

Question: How to build projects faster?
Answer:
- build a Technical Laboratory to increase the efficiency from each tap when building
- build a Construction Crane and it will construct all new projects automatically

Question: How to speed up my city progress?
Answer:
- Special projects can help you
- go to Special buildings tab from projects menu
- each Special project can significantly increase some aspect of your city, so carefully read a project description and make a descision
- you'll need some Golden Keys to build and upgrade Special buildings (each of them has 5 levels)

Question: How to build a bridge?
Answer:
- first you'll need a Landscape Institute from Unique projects
- dry a line of platforms (convert sea platforms to land platforms)
- build a Road over them, and bridge will be created automatically!

Question: How to reset the game?
Answer: Navigate to the settings menu and confirm your progress reset.

Question: I was banned, can you help me?
Answer: The game rules deny you to change time settings on your device to get benefits. Anyway, there is a chance you'll be unbanned. Please, email us to support@herocraft.com, attach the screenshot of ban message and specify your Postal Code to receive unban coupon!
